mapper.select: SELECT count(t1.id) FROM gift t1 LEFT JOIN game t2 ON t1.game_id = t2.id WHERE (t1.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR t2.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') ) AND t1.remainder>0

SELECT t1.id,t1.name,t1.create_time,t1.total,t1.remainder, t2.id AS game_id,t2.platform,t2.icon,t2.update_time FROM gift t1 LEFT JOIN game t2 ON t1.game_id = t2.id WHERE (t1.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR t2.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') ) AND t1.remainder>0 ORDER BY t1.remainder LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize}
SELECT t1.id,t1.name,t2.id AS game_id,t2.platform,t2.icon FROM gift t1 LEFT JOIN game t2 ON t1.game_id = t2.id WHERE t1.is_pop = #{0}
SELECT t1.id,t1.create_time,t2.id AS game_id,t2.platform,t2.name,t2.update_time FROM gift t1 LEFT JOIN game t2 ON t1.game_id = t2.id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC limit 0,#{nums}
